data.title: About Optum
data.meta_description: We’re a leading health solution and care delivery organization with a simple mission. Learn how we're evolving health care with you at the center.
data.text:
Text Onscreen: What if health care was simpler?

Close up view of a computer screen, a mouse pointer clicks the start button

Close up of a medical professional taking the blood pressure of a patient

Close up of a hand, with two capsules of medication

Portrait view of a white man with grey hair, as looks pensively toward the camera

Voice over says: Optum is combining every element of health…

A male, Asian doctor sits next to an elderly Asian man, and shows results on a tablet screen

Voice over says: …to bring you care experiences that are easier to navigate.

Text Onscreen: easier

A young white female doctor sits next to a young white woman, holding an avocado. There is a plate of cut fruit and vegetables on the table in front of them

Voice over says: Compassionate clinicians and services, with the same text onscreen

Words onscreen overlay a video of a young black teenager in a hospital bed, then a black female doctor speaking to a young child as she smiles

Voice over says: advanced analytics… (with the same text onscreen)

A black woman in a lab coat stands in front of a large screen displaying MRI images

Voice over says: and cutting-edge technology… (with the same text onscreen)

Close up view of a medical professional holding a tablet displaying brain scans

Several quick visuals of analytics and numbers on various screens flash by in quick succession

A black, male doctor speaks to a patient via video call

A woman wearing a head covering speaks to a doctor via her smartphone

Voice over says: all coming together for health experiences that are easier and more personalized…

Text Onscreen: more personalized

A white man with grey hair gets on a motorcycle, then a close up of the motorcycle wheels speeding along, and a shot of the man driving away

Two young adults practice yoga, while one adjusts the other’s posture

Voice over says: We're creating the care you want…

A bird’s-eye-view of a motorcycle riding along a winding mountain road

Voice over says: …so you can live better (the words “live better” appear onscreen)

The camera pans out into a narrow circular view that lands on an “O”
